This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ARC-SAMS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-06T11:36:27Z Matthew Jacobs 2015-03-06T11:36:23+00:00 2015-03-06T11:36:23+00:00 Student Journey Mapping https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;3c149183.1503 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>I am currently looking at undertaking a student journey mapping exercise<br>(particularly for Health & Social Care UG, SSPRD & PG students) \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd focusing<br>on student perspective/customer experience and the functional/process<br>mapping approach.<br><br>I wondered if anyone who has already done this would be willing to share<br>their experience - how they approached the task, any tools they used, etc. [...] Lisa Bell 2015-03-03T14:24:07+00:00 2015-03-03T14:24:07+00:00 Fwd: FW: You're invited to Student Attendance Monitoring - Enhancing Practice (23 Mar 2015) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;1b8a2f7a.1503 Hi all<br><br>As discussed at last month's ARC SAM's meeting - here is the invitation to<br>register for the student attendance monitoring event in Southampton.<br><br>Thanks, Lisa<br><br>*From:* Hudson, Julie [mailto:J.Hudson@leedsbeckett.ac.uk]<br>*Sent:* 29 January 2015 16:50<br>*Subject:* Fwd: You're invited to Student Attendance Monitoring - [...] Sinclair, Noreen A 2015-01-06T13:57:50+00:00 2015-01-06T13:57:50+00:00 Re: Advice please https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;41b0522d.1501 Hi Michelle<br><br>We would not normally take international / fee paying students if by doing so it would compromise our ability to obtain clinical / practice placements for the NHS commissions.<br><br>Kind Regards<br><br>Noreen Michelle Brooker 2015-01-06T13:23:26+00:00 2015-01-06T13:23:26+00:00 Advice please https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;22095c99.1501 Hi<br><br>Could you tell me if you take International Students/Fee paying students onto your NHS courses as additional numbers to your commissioned students?<br><br>Could you tell me if you still DBS/Occy Health check these students (assume you do), who picks up the costs? What processes do you have in place for International Students as the DBS is not appropriate for them \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd do they have to get the equivalent check completed prior to coming to the UK and present this to you? [...] Patrick Nolan 2014-12-04T15:35:37+00:00 2014-12-04T15:35:37+00:00 Your documen https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;a0fe75ff.1412 Please look your attached document.<br></html Lisa Bell 2014-11-24T10:37:18+00:00 2014-11-24T10:37:18+00:00 Role Advert https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;3cc7291a.1411 Hi all,<br><br>See email below from Wayne Keating.<br><br>Thanks, Lisa<br><br>Begin forwarded message:<br><br>> From: "Wayne Keating (SHUM)" <W.Keating@hud.ac.uk><br>> Date: 24 November 2014 10:14:18 GMT<br>> To: Lisa Bell <L.Bell@sheffield.ac.uk><br>> Subject: Role Advert for ARC SAMS distribution if possible<br>><br>> Hi Lisa<br>><br>> I wondered if this could be sent out to the ARC SAMS group?<br>><br>> Dear all<br>><br>> Vacancy \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Head of School Administration (Human & Health Sciences \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd University of Huddersfield)<br>><br>> In the new year, after 14 years at the University of Huddersfield, I will be moving on to [...] Lisa Bell 2014-11-12T11:25:28+00:00 2014-11-12T11:25:28+00:00 Fwd: E071201160-125933 Electronic DBS applications https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;9bb0e622.1411 Hi all<br><br>Following on from the last ARC SAM meeting, I contacted the DBS regarding<br>the proposed implementation of their online application system. Below is<br>their response.<br><br>Thanks, Lisa<br>---------- Forwarded message ----------<br>From: Customer Services <CustomerServices@dbs.gsi.gov.uk><br>Date: 12 November 2014 10:44<br>Subject: RE: E071201160-125933 Electronic DBS applications<br>To: Lisa Bell <l.bell@sheffield.ac.uk><br><br>Dear Lisa,<br><br>Thank you very much for your email. Some HEI\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds are not receiving these emails.<br><br>I will speak to the team about this. [...] Lisa Bell 2014-11-03T09:48:20+00:00 2014-11-03T09:48:20+00:00 Minutes - ARC SAM meeting https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;a5581b8a.1411 Hello all<br><br>Please find attached the minutes of the ARC SAM meeting held on 23rd<br>October, together with copies of the presentations from the HCPC and NHS<br>Bursaries.<br><br>Our next meetings are scheduled for:<br><br>Friday 6th February 2015 - 10.30am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 3 pm in Newcastle (NHS Bursaries<br>offices)<br><br>Tuesday 16th June 2015 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 10.30 am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 3 pm, London [...] Becky Fitt (LTS) 2014-10-20T09:32:22+00:00 2014-10-20T09:32:22+00:00 Additional practice hours accrued in paramedic sciences and midwifery programmes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;48930558.1410 Dear All<br><br>The School of Health Sciences at the University of East Anglia offers courses with practice elements in Midwifery, Nursing, Paramedic Sciences, Operating Department Practice, Physiotherapy, Speech and Language Therapies and Occupational Therapies.<br><br>The School's Attendance Policy states that in order to comply with EU regulations on maximum weekly working hours, and to safeguard the wellbeing of students in practice the School does not support practice shifts longer than 12 hours. Please<br>also let me know if you have any dietary requirements. If you could therefore come to the meeting<br>with areas you would like to discuss (or if you are unable to attend the<br>meeting, please email me, and I will raise it on your behalf). [...] Carol I Robinson 2014-09-09T14:49:21+00:00 2014-09-09T14:49:21+00:00 Re: Student systems https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;1774d104.1409 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;1774d104.1409">Re: Student systems </a> Lisa Bell 2014-09-09T15:26:25+01:00 2014-09-09T15:26:25+01:00 Student systems https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;9ffda38b.1409 Hello<br><br>I am currently on a secondment at the University of Sheffield reviewing<br>student systems. Part of the project is to see what other systems are<br>being used by HEI's. This month we're having vendor presentations from<br>SITS, Banner, SAP and Oracle.<br><br>I would be interested to hear your feedback if you use any of the above<br>systems (or any other system) - particularly regarding how well they manage<br>the complexities related to healthcare students - i.e. student placement<br>allocation etc.. [...] Lisa Bell 2014-08-07T11:23:32+01:00 2014-08-07T11:23:32+01:00 ARC SAM 2015 dates https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;310f2b69.1408 Hello<br><br>We now have two of the 2015 meeting dates for the Academic Registrars<br>Council, subjects allied to medicine meetings set. They are:<br><br>Friday 6th February 2015 - at the NHS Bursaries call centre in Newcastle<br><br>Tuesday 16th June 2015 - at Woburn House Conference Centre in London<br><br>Further details will also be sent out nearer the time. [...] Lisa Bell 2014-07-15T14:47:15+01:00 2014-07-15T14:47:15+01:00 2015 meeting date confirmed https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;6cc55093.1407 Hello<br><br>The date of the first ARC SAM meeting next year has been scheduled for<br>Friday 6th February 2015 in Newcastle (at the NHS Bursaries call centre).<br><br>Further details will be sent out nearer the time.<br><br>Thanks, Lisa Lisa Bell 2014-07-12T11:07:49+01:00 2014-07-12T11:07:49+01:00 ARC SAM minutes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-SAMS;eb50d62a.1407 Hello<br><br>Attached are the ARC SAM minutes and presentations from the meeting held on<br>4th July.<br><br>Our next meeting is on Thursday 23rd October in Coventry - further details<br>will be sent out nearer the time.<br><br>if you are interested in providing Louisa from NHS Bursaries with any<br>concerns / problems with the current maternity policy which she can forward<br>onto DH for their review, please email Louisa directly at<br>Louisa.Ruman@nhs.net [...]
